name: Mind The List
description:
God Rest You Merry, GentlemenIt's true, all kids want gifts, but the naughty ones are on the list. Make sure you give your presents to the good ones, but avoid the bad ones. Find out by asking them, but most of them will get agitated once you do, so be careful. A few sweets and helpers might get you a long way.

How to play:

  • WASD or arrows to move
  • Move mouse over a child to find out what its name is
  • Once you touch a child, they get agitated and want move faster
  • Reindeer adds speed. You can hold the button while you move
  • Candy cane colors the children  when you hover over them to see which ones are good or bad
  • Gingerbread man makes all the children good

Art, Programming and Music done by me, Whelp

  • Programmed in GameMaker Studio 2
  • Music made in Cubase Artist 9.5

Songs covered:

  • God Rest Ye Merry Gentlemen - English Traditional Christmas Carol
  • Let It Snow! Let It Snow! Let It Snow! - Sammy Cahn , Jule Styne

Check out my soundcloud or find my on Spotify, iTunes etc.
